summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons administrative detention order for Jeffrey Epstein, dated July 10, 2019, placing him in administrative detention pending classification. The order states his continued presence in general population poses a serious threat to life, property, self, staff, other inmates, or the orderly running of the institution.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the administrative detention order, placed in detention pending classification due to being perceived as a serious threat.

events.title: Epstein Placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is placed in administrative detention at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York pending classification, as his continued presence in general population is deemed a serious threat.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed in administrative detention on July 10, 2019.
The order states his continued presence in general population poses a serious threat to life, property, self, staff, other inmates, or the orderly running of the institution.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons administrative detention order form.
Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at this time.
